name: Cleaning Simulator (Demo Version)
description:
Oh. Hello! You must be the new cleaning person.

Welcome to our team. It's a pleasure to have you here with us. You're such an enrichment for our company.

You must be really excited about your new workplace. I can absolutely guarantee you, there is nothing more fulfilling than working with us.

For your first day of work, I will go through the cleaning process step by step with you.

(Keep in mind, this is a demo version of the unfinished game. The full version with more content will be released when it is finished. Feel free to comment your opinion about the current status of the game.)
